title: Uncle Si Is So Ready for Elon Musk to Free Twitter
description:
Uncle Si is pumped about Elon Musk's Twitter plans — he just has to figure out what this Twitter thing actually is. Godwin encounters a series of unfortunate events when he makes the rookie mistake of checking his carry-on. Si and Godwin are excited that the airline mask mandate is over. Si reveals what he'd do if he found $50 million. Martin and John-David introduce Si to the world of Wordle and Heardle. And Si tells the story of the deer who taught him that secondhand smoke is bad.
-
